languages.text: "Кровь с твоих рук {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}уже не смыть{/d}. Но отпусти хотя бы нас, Арильд! Тех, кого ты еще не успел изуродовать".

traits.locale_text: "Кровь с твоих рук уже не смыть. Но отпусти хотя бы нас, Арильд! Тех, кого ты еще не успел изуродовать."

languages.text: "There's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}no washing{/d} the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."
languages.original_text: "Кровь с твоих рук {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}уже не смыть{/d}. Но отпусти хотя бы нас, Арильд! Тех, кого ты еще не успел изуродовать".

traits.locale_text: "There's no washing the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't disfigured yet."
"There's no washing the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't disfigured yet."
"There's no washing the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."
"There's no washing the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."
"There's no washing the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."
"There's no washing the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."
"There's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}no washing{/d} the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."

languages.text: "Das Blut lässt sich {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}nicht von deinen Händen waschen{/d}. Doch du könntest uns zumindest gehen lassen, Aryld! Die, die du noch nicht verstümmelt hast."
languages.original_text: "There's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}no washing{/d} the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."

traits.locale_text: "Das Blut lässt sich nicht von deinen Händen waschen. Doch du könntest uns zumindest gehen lassen, Aryld! Die, die du noch nicht verstümmelt hast."

languages.text: « Tu ne pourras {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}pas laver{/d} le sang que tu as sur les mains, mais tu pourrais au moins nous laisser partir, Aryld ! Laisse partir ceux que tu n'as pas encore mutilés. »
languages.original_text: "There's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}no washing{/d} the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."

traits.locale_text: « Tu ne pourras pas laver le sang que tu as sur les mains, mais tu pourrais au moins nous laisser partir, Aryld ! Laisse partir ceux que tu n'as pas encore mutilés. »

languages.text: “你手上的鲜血已经{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}洗不掉了{/d}，但你至少还能放我们走，艾瑞德！放了那些还没被你残害的人吧。”
languages.original_text: "There's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}no washing{/d} the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."

traits.locale_text: “你手上的鲜血已经洗不掉了，但你至少还能放我们走，艾瑞德！放了那些还没被你残害的人吧。”

languages.text: 「あなたの手に付いた血は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}洗い流せない{/d}。でも、せめて私たちを解放して、アリルド！まだ傷つけていない者たちを」
languages.original_text: "There's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}no washing{/d} the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの手に付いた血は洗い流せない。でも、せめて私たちを解放して、アリルド！まだ傷つけていない者たちを」

languages.text: «No te puedes {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}lavar{/d} la sangre de las manos, ¡pero al menos podrías dejarnos marchar, Aryld! A los que aún no has mutilado».
languages.original_text: "There's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}no washing{/d} the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."

traits.locale_text: «No te puedes lavar la sangre de las manos. ¡Pero al menos podrías dejarnos ir, Aryld! A los que aún no has mutilado».

languages.text: "Ellerinizdeki kanı {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}temizleyemezsin{/d} ama en azından bizim, henüz zarar görmeyenlerin gitmesine izin verebilirsin Aryld!"
languages.original_text: "There's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}no washing{/d} the blood from your hands. But you could at least let us go, Aryld! The ones you haven't mutilated yet."

traits.locale_text: "Ellerinizdeki kanı temizleyemezsin ama en azından bizim, henüz zarar görmeyenlerin gitmesine izin verebilirsin Aryld!"
